attributes.action: Rishi Sunak Stop sending weapons to Ukraine & promote peace talks instead.
attributes.additional_details: The government should not be taking sides but speaking to both sides and trying to find a compromise to try and deescalate the current crisis and bloodshed in Ukraine.
attributes.background: The government should not be encouraging violence it should be seeking world peace to protect British citizens from an escalation into a third world war the biggest threat to the UK population since the Cuban missile crisis. The government should be pushing for a ceasefire and negotiation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632957
